RecordOperationSpec.Name: Insert RGL Biz Process GUID
RecordOperationSpec.Description: Inserts the GUID for RGL biz process.
RecordOperationSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

SPOperationImplementation.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_INSERT_RGLBIZPROC_GUID ( @ID uniqueidentifier, @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier ) as begin -- INSERT Biz Proc GUID for RGL Populate Business Process: if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
declare @rglPopulateProcessID uniqueidentifier set @rglPopulateProcessID = '9c549afc-c37c-4eb9-8e98-23d4d4e6ada4'
if not exists (select ID from dbo.USR_RGLPOPULATE_BUSINESSPROCESS where ID = @rglPopulateProcessID) insert dbo.USR_RGLPOPULATE_BUSINESSPROCESS (ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED) values (@rglPopulateProcessID, 'Default', 'RGL Populate Business Process default parameter set', @CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID , getdate(), getdate())
return 0;
end

StandardPrompt.Text: Are you sure you want to insert the RGL Biz Proc GUID?
